
The rushed intern reused primes generating RSA keys for Alice and Bob. Crack their secret message: 5625504335389679725259616905633615745099315507958600955464423634589695320756083433672343259310360584841735953687403189574000625699551759094745425198462275


The flag format is flag{...}
n=8421319253453840379396093934989959965438902561071871098023785532379492223491137192149177502087271838673575523603290179571094267835818114436415927457091929, e=163967752212418854832671099667422412514888154750146596509922315147787424592644682423727997074140355295471545115495449926260662877021507584837016329521269

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{q8kdy5aq}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 5625504335389679725259616905633615745099315507958600955464423634589695320756083433672343259310360584841735953687403189574000625699551759094745425198462275
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=8421319253453840379396093934989959965438902561071871098023785532379492223491137192149177502087271838673575523603290179571094267835818114436415927457091929, e=163967752212418854832671099667422412514888154750146596509922315147787424592644682423727997074140355295471545115495449926260662877021507584837016329521269
extra_info: p=91767746258987097233061480020347882605367963378302682314793224117919031652827, q=91767746258987097233061480020347882605367963378302682314793224117919031652827, Ï†(n)=8421319253453840379396093934989959965438902561071871098023785532379492223490953656656659527892805715713534827838079443644337662471188527988180089393786276
